ygData.subject: RE: Killing Giants in your low 30ies
ygData.msgSnippet: HG population is greatest in Rathe Mts - head for Feerott zone and take the next right passed the named bugs.  There s a plateau on the right just a little
ygData.messageBody:
HG population is greatest in Rathe Mts - head for Feerott zone and take the
next right passed the named bugs. There's a plateau on the right just a
little ways into the zone. Clear trash for HG's to spawn.

Techniques seem good. You wont beat Grim in a foot/feather race until 37ish
somewhere - maybe even more? I can beat him now at 38/39 - didn't try much
before. One time in 35 I think - pretty sure I was doing something foolish
like pulling Grim for a group cuz I had tracking and could find him and I
had to get creative as I was down to my last bub. I hit charm and luckily
it stuck. I had pet guard here hotkey'd and hit it. Then Selos again and
barely made the wood bridge. The party killed him before I got back for my
xp <sigh>.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 39th song
somewhere on Innoruuk

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@...

To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Killing Giants in your low
30ies

From: John_Senior@...

Hello all,

I made level 31 the other day, and a bubble of that exp was
made killing
Giants in N Karana, I think I've got the art of charming
mastered but I

[snips]

Well, enough of my rabbling, I'm really just interested in
some comments,
suggestions or feedback with regard to my charming methods
and places to
hunt that are good for charming.........

Many Thanks

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 31 Songs - Veeshan Server
"Where ever there is trouble, there you shall find my
corpse"
